name: Dreams of Fear Demo Version
description:
The first demo for Dreams of Fear! Play as a young kid who moved to a new town, but upon your move you learn of a brother who ran away while you were young. Explore several towns and encounter fun friends and ruthless enemies as you track down your lost brother and learn what memories are really made of!

Demo consists of:

  • Agora Town
  • Plate Breaking
  • Dad Fighting
  • Talking Cat
  • Another Talking Cat?
  • Bad Fellas
  • Dancing
  • Fightin'
  • Dreams
  • Fears
  • Friends To Talk To
  • Places To Visit
  • and, of course, The Player! (That's you!)

Controls: Arrow keys to move, Z key is actions, X is menu and back action, C is run, F5 Fullscreens, and Escape exits the game.

Help us make this project even better! Report any bugs, complaints, compliments, and general comments you have below!

NOTICE: If you exit the game, you will have to start over from the beginning. 

IF WINDOWS IS GIVING YOU A SECURITY WARNING CLICK "More Info" THEN CLICK "Run Anyway"

Demo does not represent a final product
